price: Na Yεsomaa no kͻͻ (nnipa) mpem ha anaasε deε εboro saa hͻ.
arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِاْئَةِ أَلۡفٍ أَوۡ يَزِيدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-arsalnāhu ilā mi-ati alfin aw yazīdūna
